content:
@Nick Cameron @Jasun Carr I'd like to hit the ground running in January with analysis. Some questions:

  • Do we need to wait on free form answers to be translated before starting analysis? (my opinion: no)
  • Do we want to just wait until January to turn off the survey collection even though we communicated the 22nd of Dec? (my opinion: yes)
  • Do we want to exclusively focus on the public blog post contents or try to do general analysis and then pull out a blog post from the general analysis? (my opinion: do general analysis)

Now that I've signed the NDA, I can start pulling data down and setting up a system with the translation teams.

And agreed on 2 & 3
